Posts.Content: I get my husband every year, since before we were even married:)  Last year I hid his car and he thought someone stole it lol.  I only let him panic for five minutes.  Last night he says "just so you know, I know what tomorrow is so don't think you are going to get me this year".  I just smiled.... Well I always wake him up for work in the morning and this morning I woke him up and told him it was an hour later then it was:)  he jumped out of bed saying " sh**, I am going to be late for my meeting!"  Then he turned to look at me and I started laughing lol.  I handed him a cup of coffee and said "gotcha ya". Patti
Posts.Title: Anyone Pull Any Good April Fool's Day Jokes?

Posts.Content: Best of luck on your surgery, and rads:) Patti

Posts.Content: I am on board!!!!!!!!  Wishing you the best!!!!  NED all the way! Patti
Posts.Title: My Pink Sisters, Can I get the pink bus for Monday Morning?

Posts.Content: Was just told today, stage lV mets to left lung.  My first diagnosis was 8/12 with bilateral IDC stage 2b with one fully metastic node.  Finished chemo 4.5 months ago and here I am.  There are many here that are truly amazing fighters that I will draw my strength and inspiration from them and fight like hell!:)
Posts.Title: Stage IV
